title: Tadarida
description: labeling, detection, and classification for bat sonotypes of the world
annotation: label data and create a sound reference database with the Tadarida-L interface
soundProcessingFeatures: equalize sounds and create spectrograms with the Tadarida-D interface
acousticFeatureMeasurement: automatically extract call features (e.g., duration, min and max frequency) with Tadarida-D
detectorFeatures: detect sounds with the Tadarida-D interface
classifierFeatures: create and apply classifiers using random forests using Tadarida-C or deep learning with TadariDeep
comments: Software is split into three GitHub repositories available here https://github.com/YvesBas
